Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
AddDistributionListMember SOAP Command

Adding members to a distribution list
Access: domain admin sufficient

Adding existing members is allowed, even if it may result in this request being a no-op because all <dlm> addrs are already members.

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

AddDistributionListMemberRequest

    <AddDistributionListMemberRequest id="{value-of-zimbra-id}"> ## AddDistributionListMemberRequest
        (<dlm>{members} (String)</dlm>)+
    </AddDistributionListMemberRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <AddDistributionListMemberRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
@id Required (only 1) Type:String
Zimbra ID
/dlm Required (1 or more) Type:{members} (String)
Members

AddDistributionListMemberResponse

    <AddDistributionListMemberResponse /> ## AddDistributionListMemberResponse
